alert.note: Alert for Erie; Huron (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 7:30PM EDT until August 29 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM EDT FOR HURON AND ERIE COUNTIES... At 730 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles east of Kelleys Island to near Bloomville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Sandusky, Norwalk, Western Vermilion, Vermilion, Kelleys Island, Bellevue, Willard, New London, Plymouth, Northern Milan, Milan, Wakeman, Castalia, Greenwich, Monroeville, Marblehead, Berlin Heights, North Fairfield, Bloomingville and Sandusky South. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Strong winds will proceed the heavy rain with these storms.
